# Abyssal Blood (Su)
## Overview
*Abyssal Blood (Su)*: Once per day when the barbarian enters a rage, she can choose to grow one size category larger than her base size (as *[[Enlarge Person (Spell)|enlarge person]]*, even if the barbarian isnâ€™t humanoid).

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 80
